meanings.definition: A group of synthetic corticosteroids used to treat inflammation and autoimmune conditions.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed prednisolones to reduce the swelling in my joints.
meanings.sent2: She took prednisolones daily to manage her autoimmune disorder.
meanings.sent3: After taking prednisolones, I felt like a deflated balloon, but in a good way.
meanings.sent4: The prednisolones acted like a superhero, fighting off the inflammation in my body.
meanings.sent5: The prednisolones worked like magic, calming the storm of inflammation within me.

meanings.definition: The generic name for a type of medication used to reduce swelling and relieve symptoms of various medical conditions.
meanings.sent1: My pharmacist recommended prednisolones for my allergy symptoms.
meanings.sent2: Prednisolones are commonly prescribed to alleviate pain and inflammation.
meanings.sent3: I joked that prednisolones were like tiny warriors fighting the swelling in my body.
meanings.sent4: The prednisolones were a soothing balm, easing the discomfort in my joints.
meanings.sent5: Taking prednisolones was like opening a window to let fresh air into my body.
